message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.DC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - This paper focuses on improving the performance of opportunistic networks through the use of a control layer, which is a key aspect of networking and internet architecture. 
2. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - Security is an important aspect of networking, and this paper may touch on security concerns related to the use of a control layer in opportunistic networks. 
3. cs.IT (Information Theory) - Information theory is concerned with the transmission, processing, and storage of information, which are all relevant to the topic of improving network performance. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - This paper proposes a control layer approach to improve network performance, which falls under the domain of systems and control. 
5. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - This paper may touch on distributed computing concepts related to the management of network resources through a control layer.
